name: Fireworks XR 烟花秀
description:
Mainly experience watching fireworks shows, setting off fireworks, and flying in the sky lights in VR

1.In this scene, the left hand rocker is used to perform positionteleportation with one hand
2.When setting off fireworks, use the right trigger to operate
3.The scene includes firecracker rain, fireworks cloud, and Gatlinfireworks. You need to try to realize it yourself

Fireworks Show
1.In this scene, the left hand rocker is used for one-hand flight crossing operation,and the front of VR display is the flight direction
2.When enjoying the fireworks show, use the right trigger key to switchto activate the fireworks show

Enjoy the lantern
1.In this scene, the left hand rocker is used for one-hand flight crossing operation,and the front of VR display is the flight direction
2.Enjoy the sky lamp freely in sports
